title: Emerald Radiance: 18KT Gold and Diamond Haaram
materials: 18KT Gold setting. Features a central oval-cut Emerald (80.45 Carats)
complemented by Pear & Marquise cut diamonds (3.60 Carats). The Diamonds possess exceptional sparkle and brilliance. Hyderabadi Polish for a luxurious sheen.
features: Exquisite floral and leaf-inspired design. Center focus on a large, captivating oval-shaped emerald. The Emerald is secured with a Prong Setting. Surrounding micro-pavé set diamonds enhance the Emerald's vibrancy, resembling traditional South Indian temple jewelry motifs with a modern twist. Overall design reminiscent of a Chandra Haaram.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Muhurtham)
or a milestone anniversary. Also suitable for upscale modern galas and formal events.
description: This piece showcases a captivating blend of tradition and contemporary elegance. The remarkable Emerald and Diamonds make it a precious heirloom. Exceptional craftsmanship and timeless design guarantee a lasting impression. The Haaram is not just jewelry; it's a symbol of prestige and cultural heritage.
